Package toy.das.wrb

Class WrbNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • toy.config.Node
      • toy.das.wrb.WrbNode
  • public class WrbNode
extends Node
    This class implements a WRB node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WrbNode

        public WrbNode​(int channels,
               int id,
               java.lang.String addr,
               int rmfPort,
               int f,
               int tmo,
               int tmoInterval,
               java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes,
               java.lang.String bbcConfig,
               java.lang.String serverCrt,
               java.lang.String serverPrivKey,
               java.lang.String caRoot)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        channels - the number of channels in the system (with a single Toy group this is always 1).
        id - the node id
        addr - the node ip address
        rmfPort - the node port
        f - an upper bound on the number of faulty nodes
        tmo - the time-out to wait in WRB-deliver
        tmoInterval - the time-out interval to add to tmo if wrb-deliver did not deliver a requested message
        nodes - list of Nodes that depicts the WRB-cluster
        bbcConfig - path to the bbc configuration directory
        serverCrt - path to the server certificate file
        serverPrivKey - path to the server ssl private key path
        caRoot - path to the ca certificate root, if this equals to "" the server trusts any certificate

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the node.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the node.

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast​(toy.proto.Types.Block data)
        WRB-Broadcast method.
        Parameters:
        data - the block to be disseminates (the block header includes the cid and cidSeries)

      • deliver

        public toy.proto.Types.Block deliver​(int channel,
                                     int cidSeries,
                                     int cid,
                                     int height,
                                     int sender,
                                     toy.proto.Types.Block msg)
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        WRB-Deliver method.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel that wishes to deliver a message
        cidSeries - the cidSeirs of the WRB-Deliver instance (series changes due to an invocation of the synchronization mechanism)
        cid - the id of the WRB-Deliver
        height - the height of the block to be delivered
        sender - the expected sender of the block
        msg - a massage to piggyback to the first message of BBC. If fastMode=false this is null
        Returns:
        the delivered block or null if WRB-Deliver was not able to deliver the block
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • clearBuffers

        public void clearBuffers​(toy.proto.Types.Meta key)
        Clearing the buffers from irrelevant messages. This method is called bt gc of ToyServer.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the message to be deleted
